files.patch:
@@ -52,0 +52,1 @@
+                // Currently the only part of Skara fortified for integration branches
@@ -85,0 +86,11 @@
+    /*
+     * Checks if the Pull Request's target branch is an integration branch
+     * and returns the actual target branch name if it is.
+     *
+     * In theory this should always be used if the Pull Request has been
+     * integrated, but since we set its target branch back to the initial
+     * branch after integration (to minimize disruption for now) this doesn't
+     * see much use, and is only really used above to fortify retargetDependencies.
+     *
+     * See IntegrateCommand#markIntegratedAndMerged for more details.
+     */
